requestBody.description: SetMaintenancePolicyRequest sets the maintenance policy for a cluster.

clusterId.description: The name of the cluster to update.

maintenancePolicy.description:
The maintenance policy to be set for the cluster. An empty field
clears the existing maintenance policy.

window.description: Specifies the maintenance window in which maintenance may be performed.

dailyMaintenanceWindow.description: DailyMaintenanceWindow specifies a daily maintenance operation window.

duration.description:
[Output only] Duration of the time window, automatically chosen to be
smallest possible in the given scenario.
Duration will be in [RFC3339](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt)
format "PTnHnMnS".

startTime.description:
Time within the maintenance window to start the maintenance operations.
Time format should be in [RFC3339](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt)
format "HH:MM‚Äù, where HH : [00-23] and MM : [00-59] GMT.

name.description:
The name (project, location, cluster id) of the cluster to set maintenance
policy.
Specified in the format 'projects/*/locations/*/clusters/*'.

projectId.description:
The Google Developers Console [project ID or project
number](https://support.google.com/cloud/answer/6158840).

zone.description:
The name of the Google Compute Engine
[zone](/compute/docs/zones#available) in which the cluster
resides.
